ExploreFact.Text: The station contains an orrery of the system. A Nomai named Oryza claims the system is a scaled-up representation of the orrery.
There are warp transmitters connected to the station on the north pole of most planets in the system.

A set of Nomai students were assigned a project to prepare this star system to be their clan's entry in a festival. They had to propose 7 requirements that the system would fulfill in order to demonstrate their understanding of the mechanisms of natural star systems.

RumorFact.Text: The first of 7 requirements that a Nomai project must meet.
By using another astral body's gravity to help me, I was able to reach the top of the tower.

ExploreFact.Text: The first requirement is that solid ice must be present on a planet in the system. The system's star is too hot to allow ice to re-freeze even in the furthest orbit. A Nomai named Adonsonia proposed somehow blocking the star's heat from reaching the planet they want to freeze.

RumorFact.Text: The second of 7 requirements that a Nomai project must meet.
By flooding the planet, I was able to safely enter the cave.

ExploreFact.Text: The second requirement is that a planet must have exposed geothermal activity.

RumorFact.Text: The third of 7 requirements that a Nomai project must meet.
I was able to access the rest of the structure by arriving via the warp receiver.

ExploreFact.Text: The third requirement is for the warp transmitter that does not lead to the orrery station to be aligned with at least one receiver.

RumorFact.Text: The fourth of 7 requirements that a Nomai project must meet.
By siphoning the sand off the planet using the largest planet in the system, I was able to access the rest of the structure.

ExploreFact.Text: The fourth requirement is that multiple planets in the system must have sand.

RumorFact.Text: The fifth of 7 requirements that a Nomai project must meet.
Simultaneously scanning all the astral bodies' signals activated a nearby Nomai computer.

ExploreFact.Text: The fifth requirement is that any two planets that share an orbit must be on opposite sides of the sun.

RumorFact.Text: The sixth of 7 requirements that a Nomai project must meet.
By blocking the light from the sun, I was able to quantum entangle with the rock to reach a cave below the surface.

ExploreFact.Text: The sixth and final requirement is that the largest planet in the system may not be in the furthest orbit.

RumorFact.Text: The last of 7 requirements that a Nomai project must meet.

Once all six requirements are met, the project must be submitted in the core of "Glacial Abyss!". A Nomai named Alnus pointed out that it is impossible to reach the core via the geysers while all the other project requirements are met.

ExploreFact.Text: Once all six requirements are met, the project must be submitted in the core of "Glacial Abyss!". A Nomai named Alnus pointed out that it is impossible to reach the core via the geysers while all the other project requirements are met.
